title: Need to change my email!!!!
body: I need to change my email however I can't access my old one, is there another way? If not is there at least a way to link some things from an old account to a new one. :)

replies.body: Thanks , did that and it worked!

Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and verify that you are in fact the account holder, you will be asked to answer some questions about your accounts history (Example, purchase history, first champ purchased, etc).

We here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.
